Accessed on 2008-07-02. | population_total = 657227 | population_as_of = 2008 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +01 | iso_code = DZ-12 | area_code_type = Area Code | area_code = +213 (0) 37 | blank_name_sec1 = Districts | blank_info_sec1 = 12 | blank1_name_sec1 = Municipalities | blank1_info_sec1 = 28 | website = | footnotes = }} Tébessa is a province of Algeria. Tébessa is also the name of the capital. Another important city is El Ouenza. Tebessa is only 20 kilometers west from Tunisia border. ==Divisions== The province has 12 districts. There are also 28 communes or municipalities. ===Districts=== # Bir El Ater # Bir Mokadem # Cheria # El Aouïnet # El Kouif # El Ma Labiodh # El Ogla # Morsott # Negrine # Ouenza # Oum Ali # Tébessa ==References== Category:Provinces of Algeria
